file_content.text: I have told you all I know. I can do no more for you.
You said you were gonna get the ore back.
I have done all I can. They... the other tribes will not listen.
If you say so.
Hey--you the Red Blade? Heard you were coming. Thought we'd soften up the chief for you.
Karrels sent me. I'll take it from here.
I want to talk to him.
He's all yours.
Right--he looks pretty dangerous. Get out of here.
Step away from him.
Yeah? Fine. Call out if you need us.
I... I am Odeph of the Evocii. Leader of the Voam, sacred keeper of histories. I greet you in peace, and I... am grateful.
I heard you're the one to talk to about Nem'ro's missing ore.
I'm investigating a theft.
Yes. I will talk, but it will not please you.
Are you alright? Do you need a doctor?
You okay?
No. Thank you, but no.
You've come about the ores, I think. I swear it was one of the other tribes who attacked your shipment. Evocii who refuse peace.
You know why I'm here. Start talking, or I'll do a lot worse to you.
Cooperate or else.
I--yes. I understand. I'll tell you about the ore.
It was the other tribes who attacked your shipment. The Evocii who--who refuse peace.
In gratitude to Nem'ro for all he has done, I spoke to my... misguided brothers. But they will not return Nem'ro's metals.
Any luck with your "interrogation"?
How's that going?
Says he's real sorry he couldn't make a deal. That's about it.
The other tribes... the Evocii who refuse peace... it was--it was they who attacked your shipment.
You have given us homes and work. I help you willingly--but the tribes will not return Nem'ro's metals.
They won't even negotiate?
Why?
It's okay. You tried your best. What went wrong?
Don't worry
You think you can lie to me? You're probably working with the rest of the Evocii.
Worthless fool.
No. I know that our survival is a privilege. I would not betray Nem'ro.
Damn creep.
I would not... I would not betray Nem'ro.
The tribes--they stole the shipment to spite the Hutts, and to use for themselves. They will make weapons. Machines.
They took the metals to their great village in the swamps. Only a beast or a shadow can enter--seek the shipment there, if you wish.
Thank you. You've been a great help.
That's all I need.
I only do my part. I only want peace.
Your help is appreciated. Can I repay you?
Can I assist you somehow?
I ask for nothing. But... you may walk in our camp. There are others who have their own needs.
Farewell, offworlder.
Feel lucky I'm letting you live, Odeph--unless I find out you're lying.
You better be right.
You will not. I only want peace.
All right, chief. Let's get you a medpac or two. You've had a busy day....
This is our home. You are welcome here.
